name: Unique Shop
description:
Join Cupcake the unicorn in this 3D adventure game
as he goes shopping in a funky supermarket! Buy different weird products,
help the employees out of trouble and work through your shopping list!



 More than 50 different products
Full controller support
OpenDyslexic Font
Lightning fast shopping cart
No consequences for your actions








Unique Shop is a HTK 2nd semester game that was built from scratch within 6 months.
The game was developed in the Unity engine and assets were created in Blender.




Created by
Loki+LPunicorn


NPC images by
Kira
Mischa
Thomas
Liz
Blago
Kamil


Bonus assets by

TheGreatKida


Also important
Humble Bundle
We Love Indies
Joel Steudler




1. Download
2. Unpack
3. Start UniqueShop.exe
4. Go shopping
